title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1245.2 - Electricity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1245.2 - Electricity

State Regulations
(a) Wharf or shed
lights, for each 12 hour period or fraction thereof $1 per light
(b) Electricity will be furnished at the same
rate as would be charged if supplied directly to the user by the local utility
company. (c) Where vessel furnished
shore cables, etc............. Cost of labor for hooking up
(d) Where terminal furnishes shore cables, etc............. $10 service charge plus labor and materials for hooking
up. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1245.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
